Lawrence.House at 15-19 Park Street:
The House 15-19 Park Street or Henry Preston House is a historic house at 15-19 Park Street in Methuen, Massachusetts.
Built around 1840, 15-19 Park Street was originally built as a one-story house belonging to Henry Preston who had a wheelwright shop next door. Assessor's records indicate that in the 1850s, the house belonged to Enoch A. Merrill, and in 1875 the estate of Enoch A. Merrill was taxed to Joel Foster.
